title: Urban Grocery Delivery Service
desc_split: A grocery retailer operates multiple distribution centers (`<loc_depot>`) to supply fresh produce and perishables to <num_customer> local stores (<loc_customer>). Each store has a specific delivery window `<time_windows>` to align with staff shifts and stock rotation schedules. Delivery trucks from the depots must carry no more than `<capacity>` kg of goods, and each store requires a unique `<demand>` amount. The challenge is to design routes that start at a depot, deliver all orders within time windows without overloading trucks, and end at the last store to reduce idle travel.
label: mdovrptw
